New Records: Ireland were bowled out for their second-lowest score in T20I cricket during the match against India
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh spearheaded the assault, removing both Irish openers in the third over
Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah kept up the pressure, dismantling the middle order and leaving Ireland reeling
Arshdeep ended with impressive figures, claiming 3 wickets for just 12 runs
Bumrah and Pandya picked up 2 wickets each
Post-Match Reflections: The pitch conditions at the stadium have come under severe scrutiny following the recent South Africa-Sri Lanka game
Questions regarding the fairness and safety of the playing surface are mounting
Miscellaneous Highlights: The highly anticipated India-Pakistan encounter is scheduled to be played here
The latest match saw India exploiting the pitch's characteristics to their advantage, particularly benefiting the fast bowlers
